title: Pickled Chilies
source: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
categories: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
ingredients: - 2 cups thinly sliced (¼ inch thick) fresh long red Thai chilies or jalapeño or serrano peppers
directions: 1. Combine the vinegar, ⅔ cup of water, the sugar, and salt in a medium bowl and whisk until the sugar and salt are dissolved.

2. Put the chilies in a jar with a lid or a container with a tight-fitting lid and pour the pickling solution over them. Cover and let sit at room temperature for 24 hours. Store, tightly covered, in the refrigerator for up to 1 month.
